item.description:
Boston Restaurant Week Winter 2007
Sunday, March 4 through Friday, March 9

It appears VERY difficult if in fact, impossible, to get reservations for more than 4 people during restaurant week. Sooooo, I've taken the liberty to make several reservations through out the week. So please RSVP (and HONOR it!) to one you can make -- they will be intimate foursomes. If no RSVPs fill that particular date 3 days in advance I will cancel the reservation.

SUNDAY, March -- 6:00 pm
Vox Populi
4 ppl

Address:
755 Boylston St., Boston, MA 02116
Cross Street: Fairfield & Exeter St.
Phone: (617) 424-8300
Dress Code: Business Casual

Message from the Restaurant: Thank you for choosing Vox Populi. Please contact us if your plans change. We look forward to serving you.
To take advantage of the Boston Restaurant Week fixed-price offering, be sure to request the special menu when you arrive. Note that not all restaurants are offering the Restaurant Week menu on Sunday. For details, visit: http://www.opentable....

group.name: Boston/Burbs Life after Divorce Social Group

item.name: Restaurant Week - Vox Populi
